article.headline: Salesforce.com Inc., Boeing share gains lead Dow's 585-point surge
article.body: Powered by strong returns for shares of Salesforce.com Inc. and Boeing, the Dow Jones Industrial Average is soaring Wednesday afternoon. Shares of Salesforce.com Inc. CRM, +2.21% and Boeing BA, -0.39% are contributing around a third of the index's intraday rally, as the Dow DJIA, +0.56% is trading 585 points, or 2.1%, higher. Salesforce.com Inc.'s shares are up $9.65, or 3.9%, while those of Boeing have risen $5.43, or 3.4%, combining for an approximately 99-point boost for the Dow. Also contributing significantly to the gain are UnitedHealth UNH, +1.68%, 3M MMM, +0.94%, and Intel INTC, -1.03%. A $1 move in any of the index's 30 components results in a 6.58-point swing. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights using data from Dow Jones and FactSet. See our market data terms of use.
